DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of INS117548 ophthalmic solution.
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled Study of INS117548 Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Glaucoma (P08650)
DOC.criteria: Have a diagnosis of bilateral ocular hypertension or early primary open angle glaucoma Have best corrected visual acuity in both eyes of at least +0.5 or better Are diagnosed with closed angle glaucoma, exfoliation syndrome or exfoliation glaucoma, and pigment dispersion or secondary glaucoma Have a history of any type of intraocular surgery, except for cataract surgery Have had cataract surgery within three months
